title: Rajputana Jadau Kundan Haaram - Emerald and Ruby Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణము) with Hyderabadi Polish. Set with high-quality Kundan stones
and vibrant emeralds (పచ్చలు) of VS clarity. The pendant features a cabochon emerald center.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases intricate Rajputana-inspired Jadau craftsmanship, featuring meticulously placed Kundan stones. The pendant boasts a delicate floral design (పూల డిజైన్), enhanced by the brilliant rubies and emeralds. The settings are all hand-done, showcasing the skill of our master artisans. The graduated design and adjustable dori ensure a comfortable and secure fit. Has Hyderabadi finish for an exquisite antique look.
colors: with the striking contrast of ruby red
and the white brilliance of Kundan stones. This traditional color combination (సంప్రదాయ రంగులు) is highly auspicious in South Indian culture.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. It's also ideal for a half-saree function or a grand festive celebration like Diwali or Ugadi.
description: This Haaram is a timeless heirloom piece, embodying the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The meticulous Jadau work, combined with the vibrant gemstones, makes it a true work of art. The use of 22K gold ensures lasting value, and the Hyderabadi polish gives it a regal antique look. This piece is not only beautiful but also carries cultural significance, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
